meanings.definition: Antimitotics: substances that inhibit or prevent cell division
meanings.sent1: The antimitotics stopped the cells from dividing.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use antimitotics to slow down cell division in the body.
meanings.sent3: The antimitotics had a party and stopped the cells from dancing.
meanings.sent4: Her determination acted like antimitotics, halting any distractions.
meanings.sent5: The classroom demonstration vividly showed how antimitotics work on cells.

meanings.definition: Antimitotics: drugs used to treat cancer by preventing the growth and spread of cancer cells
meanings.sent1: She took antimitotics to fight against the cancer cells.
meanings.sent2: The hospital provided antimitotics to help stop the cancer from spreading.
meanings.sent3: The antimitotics went on a mission to defeat the cancer cells.
meanings.sent4: Hope was the antimitotics that kept her fighting against the cancer.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained how antimitotics target and destroy cancer cells.
